summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a requirement to adhere to robots.txt, as well as rate limiting based on IP address. It directs users to the Government Publishing Office (GPO) Bulk Data Download site (https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/) as an alternative for accessing the desired information. The nature of the information being scraped and why it's considered "misbehaving" is not specified within the document, and appears to be a suggestion of alternative resource.
